figureDeclaration.name: Figure
figureDeclaration.description: The Basic Figure. Does not provide any graphical representation by default. The methods paintFigure() and paintBorder() should be overriden to materialize the figure. Note that the Shape figure should be used whether it is possible.

figureDeclaration.name: Shape
figureDeclaration.description: A Shape is just a graphic element. It extends the Figure by providing more control on the graphics properties : line width, line style, ... As it is an abstract class, its methods outlineShape() and fillShape() should be implemented.

figureDeclaration.name: Port
figureDeclaration.description: A Figure used to draw a Port. This should be only used for Figures that are contained by a BorderAttachedLayout. This is a simple implementation of the IPortFigure, the port is just a rectangle shape and its graphical representation does not depends of the border it is attached to.

figureDeclaration.name: OrientedPort
figureDeclaration.description: A Figure used to draw an oriented Port. The figure shape depends on the border it is attached to : it is an arrow that is oriented into the container Figure.

figureDeclaration.name: LabelledPort
figureDeclaration.description: A Figure used to draw an Port figure with a Label associated. Depending on the border the figure is attached to, the layout of the PortFigure and the LabelFigure changes.

figureDeclaration.name: Class
figureDeclaration.description: A Figure that will represent a Class. The header is an EditableLabel, the contentPane is a vertical ToolbarLayout.

figureDeclaration.name: Container
figureDeclaration.description: A Class that provide a container Figure implementation. A figure that display child figures in a XYLayout.

figureDeclaration.name: Label
figureDeclaration.description: This Figure is used only to render a Label that implement the ILabel interace to provide directEdit in the diagram.

figureDeclaration.name: State
figureDeclaration.description: This figure is deprecated from the 0.10.0 version of Topcased. You should use the BorderedLabel instead.

figureDeclaration.name: Comment
figureDeclaration.description: The figure to display a Comment. A Figure with a bent corner and an embedded TextFlow within a FlowPage that contains text.

figureDeclaration.name: Package
figureDeclaration.description: A Figure that will represent a Package. The header is an EditableLabel aligned to the left, the contentPane is an XYLayout.

figureDeclaration.name: Man
figureDeclaration.description: Draw a Figure that looks a Man with a head, a body, two arms and two legs !

figureDeclaration.name: Woman
figureDeclaration.description: Draw a Figure that looks a Woman with a head, a body, two arms, two legs and a dress !

figureDeclaration.name: Graphic With Bottom Label
figureDeclaration.description: The figure to display a Figure (by default, a cross is drawn) with a Label at the Bottom. This figure is @deprecated : you should use the GraphicWithLabelFigure figure instead.

figureDeclaration.name: Computer
figureDeclaration.description: Draw a Figure that looks a Computer.

figureDeclaration.name: Cloud
figureDeclaration.description: Draw a Figure that looks a Cloud.

figureDeclaration.name: BorderedLabel
figureDeclaration.description: Draw a Rectangle and add a centered Label in the Rectangle shape. The Figure extends the ILabel interface so that the "direct Edit" functionality is enabled.

figureDeclaration.name: RectangleFigure
figureDeclaration.description: Draw a Rectangle

figureDeclaration.name: RoundedRectangle
figureDeclaration.description: Draw a Rectangle with rounded corners.

figureDeclaration.name: Ellipse
figureDeclaration.description: Draw an Ellipse in the bounds of the Figure.

figureDeclaration.name: Container With Inner Label
figureDeclaration.description: This figure creates a container with a background figure (a rectangle figure by default) and a label in this figure. The position of the label can be defined (TOP, LEFT, BOTTOM, RIGHT or CENTER) and the background figure customized overriding the createBackgroungFigure() method.

figureDeclaration.name: Graphic With Label Figure
figureDeclaration.description: This figure creates a bodyFigure (a rectangle figure by default) and a label associated with the body figure. The position of the label can be defined (TOP, LEFT, BOTTOM or RIGHT) and the body figure customized overriding the createBodyFigure() method.

figureDeclaration.name: Image With Label Figure
figureDeclaration.description: This figure creates a Figure composed of an Image and a Label associated with this picture. The position of the Label can be defined (TOP, LEFT, BOTTOM or RIGHT) and you need to specify the appropriate path to the Image in the generated Figure implementation.

figureDeclaration.name: ImageFigure
figureDeclaration.description: Just a reference to the ImageFigure Draw2D class used to associated just a Figure with the Figure.
